title: FCC Entity
description: An entity registered with the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) that provides telecommunications services.

frn.title: FCC Registration Number
frn.description: Also known as a CORES ID, this is a unique identifier for the entity in the FCC's CORES system. Note that this should be a 10-digit number, paddded with leading zeros if necessary.

form499ID.title: FCC Form 499 ID
form499ID.description: A unique identifier for the Form 499 submission. Typically present for telecommunications providers and other entities that pay into the Universal Service Fund.

legalName.title: Legal Name
legalName.description: The legal name of the entity as registered with the FCC.

dbaName.title: Doing Business As Name
dbaName.description: The name under which the entity does business, if different from the legal name.

universalServiceFundContributor.title: Universal Service Fund Contributor
universalServiceFundContributor.description: Indicates whether the entity is a contributor to the Universal Service Fund.

oneOf.description: Incumbent Local Exchange Carrier. Typically a legacy telephone company that was in existence prior to the Telecommunications Act of 1996.
Competitive Local Exchange Carrier. A newer entrant into the telecommunications market that competes with ILECs.
A carrier that is not an ILEC.

providerID.title: Fixed Broadband Provider ID
providerID.description: A unique 6-digit code generated by the FCC that identifies each service provider.

headquartersAddress.title: Headquarters Address
headquartersAddress.description: The physical address of the entity's headquarters.

dcAgentAddress.title: DC Agent Address
dcAgentAddress.description: The physical address of the entity's DC agent.

dcAgentPhoneNumber.description: The phone number of the entity's DC agent.

customerInquiriesAddress.title: Customer Inquiries Address
customerInquiriesAddress.description: The physical address to which customer inquiries should be directed.

customerInquiriesPhoneNumber.description: The phone number to which customer inquiries should be directed.

inactiveAt.title: Inactive At
inactiveAt.description: The date on which the entity became inactive, if applicable.

succeededBy.title: Succeeded By
succeededBy.description: The FRN of the entity that succeeded this one, if applicable.
